trans-unit.source: Defines an interface that creates instances of classes that implement <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegion" />.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个接口，该接口创建实现 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegion" /> 的类的实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegionFactory> interface defines methods that are used by Microsoft Office Outlook and the Outlook add-in to create instances of classes that implement <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegion>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegionFactory>接口定义通过 Microsoft Office Outlook 和 Outlook 外接程序用于创建实现的类的实例的方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegion>。

trans-unit.source: When you add an **Outlook Form Region** item to an Outlook add-in project, Visual Studio adds a form region factory class to the project that implements the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegionFactory> interface.
trans-unit.target: 当你将添加**Outlook 窗体区域**项向 Outlook 外接程序项目，Visual Studio 将窗体区域工厂类添加到实现的项目<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegionFactory>接口。

trans-unit.source: You can also manually create a form region factory class that implements the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegionFactory> interface.
trans-unit.target: 你也可以手动创建的窗体区域工厂类实现<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegionFactory>接口。

trans-unit.source: If you do this, you must also create a form region class that implements <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegion>.
trans-unit.target: 如果这样做，你还必须创建实现的窗体区域类<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegion>。

trans-unit.source: Create an instance of the form region class in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegionFactory.CreateFormRegion%2A> method of the form region factory class.
trans-unit.target: 创建中的窗体区域类的实例<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegionFactory.CreateFormRegion%2A>窗体区域工厂类的方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.FormRegion" /> that represents the native form region.
trans-unit.target: 表示本机表单区域的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.FormRegion" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of a class that implements the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegion" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 返回实现 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegion" /> 接口的类的实例。

trans-unit.source: An instance of a class that implements the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegion" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 实现 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegion" /> 接口的类的实例。

trans-unit.source: If you manually create a form region factory class, you must also create a form region class that implements the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegion> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如果你手动创建的窗体区域工厂类，则必须创建实现的窗体区域类<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegion>接口。

trans-unit.source: Create an instance of the form region class in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegionFactory.CreateFormRegion%2A> method and return the object to Outlook.
trans-unit.target: 创建中的窗体区域类的实例<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegionFactory.CreateFormRegion%2A>方法，并且返回到 Outlook 的对象。

trans-unit.source: The Outlook item that caused the form region to load.
trans-unit.target: 导致表单区域加载的 Outlook 项。

trans-unit.source: The mode of the Outlook item that caused the form region to load.
trans-unit.target: 导致表单区域加载的 Outlook 项的模式。

trans-unit.source: This mode is represented by the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlFormRegionMode" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 此模式由 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlFormRegionMode" /> 枚举表示。

trans-unit.source: The type of form region being loaded.
trans-unit.target: 加载的表单区域的类型。

trans-unit.source: This mode is represented by the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlFormRegionSize" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 此模式由 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlFormRegionSize" /> 枚举表示。

trans-unit.source: Returns an Outlook Form Storage (.ofs) file.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Outlook 表单存储 (.ofs) 文件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array that contains the contents of the .ofs file.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 数组，包含 .ofs 文件的内容。

trans-unit.source: This method is called only if the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegionFactory.Kind%2A> property of the form region factory returns the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionKindConstants.Ofs> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 仅当调用此方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegionFactory.Kind%2A>属性的窗体区域工厂返回<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionKindConstants.Ofs>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The Outlook item that caused the form region to load.
trans-unit.target: 导致表单区域加载的 Outlook 项。

trans-unit.source: The mode of the Outlook item that caused the form region to load.
trans-unit.target: 导致表单区域加载的 Outlook 项的模式。

trans-unit.source: This mode is represented by the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlFormRegionMode" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 此模式由 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlFormRegionMode" /> 枚举表示。

trans-unit.source: The type of form region being loaded.
trans-unit.target: 加载的表单区域的类型。

trans-unit.source: This mode is represented by the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlFormRegionSize" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 此模式由 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlFormRegionSize" /> 枚举表示。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the form region should appear for the specified Microsoft Office Outlook item.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示是否应为指定的 Microsoft Office Outlook 项显示表单区域。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> that indicates whether the form region should appear for the specified Outlook item.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />，指示是否应为指定的 Outlook 项显示表单区域。

trans-unit.source: If you manually create a form region factory class, you can use this method to prevent an Outlook item from displaying the form region.
trans-unit.target: 如果你手动创建的窗体区域工厂类，可以使用此方法若要禁止显示窗体区域的 Outlook 项。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of form region that the factory creates.
trans-unit.target: 获取工厂创建的表单区域的类型。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the type of form region that the factory creates.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示该工厂创建的窗体区域的类型。

trans-unit.source: If you manually create a form region factory class, you must return either <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionKindConstants.WindowsForms> or <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionKindConstants.Ofs> for this property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你手动创建的窗体区域工厂类，您必须返回<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionKindConstants.WindowsForms>或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionKindConstants.Ofs>此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of properties that describe how the form region appears in Microsoft Office Outlook.
trans-unit.target: 获取属性的集合，这些属性描述表单区域在 Microsoft Office Outlook 中的显示方式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionManifest" /> that represents a collection of properties that describe how the form region appears in Outlook.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionManifest" />表示描述窗体区域在 Outlook 中的显示方式的属性集合。
